## setLogLevel (undefined)

Set the log level for both the `@livekit/components-react` package and the `@livekit-client` package. To set the `@livekit-client` log independently, use the `liveKitClientLogLevel` prop on the `options` object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function setLogLevel(level: LogLevel, options?: SetLogLevelOptions): void;
```
